name: Space Attack (Maribell)
description:
Hello!! 

I'm a complete newbie! This is my cute version of Space Invaders, but in it, you play the sun defending your planets. :) 

It was made for the game jam Make a Game Club - Follow a Tutorial

This the very first Unity game I made (with the help of the  tutorial below) and  with my own game art! 

Move with arrow keys and shoot with "F" key.

Thanks for visiting this page!

Below is my IG link with my artwork:

@maribell_arts

 Credits:   Tutorial Used:

Stephen Barr's Space Invaders Tutorial

Font by: JazzCreates

https://assetstore.unity.com/publishers/9828

Music: Enchanted Tiki 86 by cynicmusic
